data.name: Nick Fury
data.description: The legendary leader who spreads advantages to allies and summons S.H.I.E.L.D. agents.

starItems.name: Nick Fury
starItems.description: The legendary leader who spreads advantages to allies and summons S.H.I.E.L.D. agents.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage. Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy on Crit. Energy is granted to non-summoned adjacent allies.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage. Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> ability energy on each Crit. Energy is granted to non-summoned adjacent allies.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage. Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> ability energy on each Crit. Energy is granted to non-summoned adjacent allies.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to Chain

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage. Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> ability energy on each Crit. Energy is granted to non-summoned adjacent allies.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage. Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> ability energy on each Crit. Energy is granted to non-summoned adjacent allies.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Always Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage. Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> ability energy on each Crit. Energy is granted to non-summoned adjacent allies.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage + Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage. Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> ability energy on each Crit. Energy is granted to non-summoned adjacent allies.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.

1.description: Gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>. Spread all positive effects on self to all allies, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
1.nextUpgrade: Heal self, Kestrel, Coulson, all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color>, and all <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health

2.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>. Spread all positive effects on self to all allies, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Heal self, Kestrel, Coulson, all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies, and all <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

3.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> + <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>. Spread all positive effects on self to all allies, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Heal self, Kestrel, Coulson, <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies and all <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

4.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> + <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>. Spread all positive effects on self to all allies, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Heal self, Kestrel, Coulson, <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies and all <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color> allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

5.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>. Spread all positive effects on self to all allies, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Heal self, Kestrel, Coulson, all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies, and all <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color> allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

6.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>. Spread all positive effects on self to all allies, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Heal self, Kestrel, Coulson, all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies, and all <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color> allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

7.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>. Spread all positive effects on self to all allies, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Heal self, Kestrel, Coulson, all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies, and all <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color> allies for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

1.description: Summon 1 S.H.I.E.L.D. Agent. Gain a positive effect for 2 turns. Apply Defense Up + 2 Deathproof to summoned agent. Possible Summons: > S.H.I.E.L.D. Operative + Nick Fury gains Speed Up
1.nextUpgrade: Summon 1-2 S.H.I.E.L.D. Agents Additional Possible Summon: > S.H.I.E.L.D. Security + Nick Fury gains Offense Up

2.description: Summon 1-2 S.H.I.E.L.D. Agents. Gain a positive effect for 2 turns. Apply Defense Up + 2 Deathproof to summoned agent. Possible Summons: > S.H.I.E.L.D. Operative + Nick Fury gains Speed Up > S.H.I.E.L.D. Security + Nick Fury gains Offense Up

3.description: Summon 1-2 S.H.I.E.L.D. Agents. Gain a positive effect for 2 turns. Apply Defense Up, 2 Deathproof, and Taunt to summoned agents. Possible Summons: > S.H.I.E.L.D. Operative + Nick Fury gains Speed Up > S.H.I.E.L.D. Security + Nick Fury gains Offense Up

4.description: Summon 2 S.H.I.E.L.D. Agents. Gain a positive effect for 2 turns. Apply Defense Up, 2 Deathproof, and Taunt to summoned agents. Possible Summons: > S.H.I.E.L.D. Operative + Nick Fury gains Speed Up > S.H.I.E.L.D. Security + Nick Fury gains Offense Up
4.nextUpgrade: Apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to summoned agents

5.description: Summon 2 S.H.I.E.L.D. Agents. Gain a positive effect for 2 turns. Apply Defense Up, 2 Deathproof, and Taunt for 2 turns to summoned agents. Possible Summons: > S.H.I.E.L.D. Operative + Nick Fury gains Speed Up > S.H.I.E.L.D. Security + Nick Fury gains Offense Up

6.description: Summon 2-3 S.H.I.E.L.D. Agents. Gain a positive effect for 2 turns. Apply Defense Up, 2 Deathproof, and Taunt for 2 turns to summoned agents. Possible Summons: > S.H.I.E.L.D. Operative + this character gains Speed Up > S.H.I.E.L.D. Security + this character gains Offense Up

7.description: Summon 3 S.H.I.E.L.D. Agents. Gain a positive effect for 2 turns. Apply Defense Up, 2 Deathproof, and Taunt for 2 turns to summoned agents. Possible Summons: > S.H.I.E.L.D. Operative + Nick Fury gains Speed Up > S.H.I.E.L.D. Security + Nick Fury gains Offense Up

1.description:
On Spawn:
> Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self, Coulson, and all <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color> allies.
> Fill Speed Bar for self by +<color=#86e619>10%</color> + <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> ally.

On any <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally's turn, <color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to self or a random ally. If the ally granted <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> is Kestrel, Coulson, Nick Fury, a <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color>, or <color=#fff568>INVADER</color>, also apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, with <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies, always apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to self or a random ally.

<color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color>, <color=#fff568>INVADER</color>, Coulson, and Kestrel allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor.
<color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color>, <color=#fff568>INVADER</color>, Coulson, and Kestrel allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Resistance.
1.nextUpgrade:
On Turn, +<color=#86e619>30%</color> to apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self, <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color>, Coulson, and Kestrel allies
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Resistance for <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color>, <color=#fff568>INVADER</color>, Coulson, and Kestrel allies
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, always apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>

2.description:
On Spawn:
> Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self, Coulson, and all <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color> allies.

MINION</color>, or <color=#fff568>INVADER</color>, also apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

<color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color>, <color=#fff568>INVADER</color>, Coulson, and Kestrel allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor.
<color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color>, <color=#fff568>INVADER</color>, Coulson, and Kestrel allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Resistance.
